pingExplain: !ping - evaluates your ping to the server
muteExplain: !mute - mute all users from the voice channel you are in
unmuteExplain: !unmute - unmute all users from the voice channel you are in
muteError: You need to join a voice channel first
unmuteError: You're not in a voice channel, so I can't unmute people
